publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3567 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2002 Amendment Order 2002-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2002 Amendment Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-3567 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2002 Amendment Order 2002-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2002 Amendment Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
